trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around August 30th 2011
Summary: Saw triangular craft gliding over our neighborhood and it made no sound.
divs: Sighting Details1st sighting: My father had called me outside to see something "strange" and that's when I noticed a craft that had a blinking red light that would blink consecutively and it appeared to go from one point in the sky to another far off point really fast and that's when i noticed that this was not a craft ive seen before. 2nd sighting: I had went inside again to get something and my father had told my sister about what he had seen. She went outside and he immediately followed minutes later I decided to go back outside as well. We were looking up at the sky and that's when we saw the red blinking lights again coming from a different direction and again this craft emitted no sound which was odd for a craft of this size. My sister and I in a futile attempt to get close to it decided to chase after this craft.. that's when we got a closer look at it and noticed that this craft was not an airplane or a helicopter. It was triangular in shape and had 3 lights in the back and a red blinking light in the center. AS we chased it we noticed that it did not make a sound and that it just glided in the air like a kite. Then we saw it turn abruptly as if it was going to go back around but at that precise moment it disappeared behind a house in our neighborhood.
